statements: SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_price DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Wood';
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_price BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT material_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM building_materials GROUP BY material_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_price DESC, material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Wood' OR material_type = 'Metal';
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM building_materials WHERE material_price > 1000 ORDER BY material_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_price BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM building_materials WHERE material_type = 'Concrete' ORDER BY material_price ASC, material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM building_materials WHERE material_category = 'Wood';
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT b.material_name, t.technical_specifications FROM building_materials b INNER JOIN technical_data t ON b.material_id = t.material_id;
SELECT * FROM building_materials WHERE material_category='Wood' AND material_name='Oak'
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_name, material_category FROM building_materials WHERE material_category='Metal' ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT b.material_name, t.technical_specifications FROM building_materials b JOIN technical_data t ON b.material_id = t.material_id
SELECT b.material_name, b.material_category, t.technical_specifications FROM building_materials b LEFT JOIN technical_data t ON b.material_id = t.material_id
SELECT * FROM building_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM building_materials WHERE material_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM material_specifications WHERE spec_name = 'Dimension';
SELECT spec_name, spec_value FROM material_specifications WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM building_materials;
SELECT spec_name, spec_value FROM material_specifications WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_description FROM building_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;

SELECT m.material_name, s.spec_name, t.tech_property FROM building_materials m JOIN material_specifications s ON m.material_id = s.material_id JOIN technical_data t ON m.material_id = t.material_id WHERE s.spec_name = 'weight';
SELECT * FROM technical_data WHERE tech_value LIKE '%water%';
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers
SELECT spec_id, spec_details FROM specifications
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type='Metal'
SELECT data_name, data_type, data_value FROM technical_data WHERE material_id=1
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT spec_details FROM specifications WHERE supplier_id = 2
SELECT data_name, data_type, data_value FROM technical_data WHERE material_id = 3
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_description FROM BuildingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Wood';
SELECT * FROM MaterialSpecifications ORDER BY spec_id DESC;
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, material_inventory.quantity FROM MaterialInventory INNER JOIN Suppliers ON material_inventory.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM BuildingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM BuildingMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT m.material_name, s.spec_name, s.spec_value FROM BuildingMaterials m JOIN MaterialSpecifications s ON m.material_id = s.material_id WHERE s.spec_value = 'waterproof';

SELECT m.material_name, t.data_type, t.data_value, s.supplier_name FROM BuildingMaterials m JOIN TechnicalData t ON m.material_id = t.material_id JOIN MaterialInventory i ON m.material_id = i.material_id JOIN Suppliers s ON i.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE i.quantity > 100;

SELECT m.material_name, s.supplier_name, i.quantity FROM BuildingMaterials m JOIN MaterialInventory i ON m.material_id = i.material_id JOIN Suppliers s ON i.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE s.supplier_location = 'New York';
